Description:
IN - 312288585 - You have failed to ensure that the risks from fire and/or explosion associated with your unenclosed sock filter dust collection unit located in Building B of your premises is either eliminated or reduced, so far as is reasonably practicable, in that the bank of 3 sock collectors is completely unenclosed and is situated next to a working area such that if a fire and/or explosion did occur your employees are liable to be showered with burning material.

IN - 312288730 - The washing facilities provided were unsuitable in that they did not have hot or warm running water; the sink was full of debris which suggested it was unusable at the time; and there was no evidence of soap and a means of drying hands.
